description: Mock API handlers for retrieving animal behavior data from locally imported JSON datasets, used for frontend testing purposes.

methods.name: getSelectedAnimal
methods.description: Returns the first animal from the mockAnimals dataset.

methods.name: getBehaviorCounts
methods.description: Calculates and returns counts of behaviors grouped by their type.

methods.name: getDurationBreakdown
methods.description: Summarizes total behavior duration per type.

methods.name: getDailyHeatmap
methods.description: Generates a distribution of behaviors over 24 hours based on start minutes.

methods.name: getBehaviorTypes
methods.description: Returns a list of unique behavior types.
